desc: Passionate about artisan cheese from Britain and Europe, Slate Cheese is a specialist cheese retailer in Aldeburgh & Southwold on the Suffolk Coast. Buy cheese online, join the Slate Monthly Cheese Club or visit our Suffolk shops.

layout.text: Slate is your springboard to the finest artisan cheeses produced by the very best British and European cheesemakers. Order from our hand-selected range today to discover exceptional cheeses with outstanding flavour.
